sub_title: Pro-Hydrogen , Motivator, Specialist motorcycle , consultant, entrepreneur.
summary:
"Follow your dreams , nothing is impossible."

In my life when I set a goal I focussed 110 % on these  and made it happen. 
Using my positive attitude and human skills to get the right people around me to make it my peer group.

My biggest personal/sports Achievement 
as a kid I saw on TV the "Paris Dakar rally", the toughets rally in the world  in the African dessert 
I always dreamt of doing this when I get older.
In 2007 I raced and finsihed on a Motorbike after 14 days. 


My favorite qoute for work;
'Where Focus Goes, Energy Flows"

My biggest business achievement; 
Create a complete new  parts and accessory line-up for Motocross bikes ATV and Side by Side for Yamaha Motor . 
I introduced the GYTR (Genuine Yamaha Technology Racing) ) brand in Europe and made it a strong reliable, profitable and succesfull brand, used by race teams and worlchampions today.
I could proudly say ;
"From 0 to Hero" 

How did I get to these succeses?
"Knowledge is power, Motivation is key"
Gain knowledge and create a network with people around me.
Motivate that team and you can reach incredible goals.
It gives me and the team energy to make things happen. 

Having worked both on workfloor and at the office-desk, gave me great insights .
With this advantage managing projects in technicall fields are for me easy to manage  and to steer as I really know what is possible and what NOT. 
No waste of time.
It is best of both worlds.

I always want to be a specialist in things, it requires training and development in many aspects. 
I really love gaining new knowledge as the innovation continous.

I was a team manager of a 40 people team,was a sports athlete, followed several train the trainer courses , 
 am teacher in sports, first aid responder. 

My specialities: 
-Go for the impossible
-Getting things done.
-Get connected.
-Building trust Relationships
-Give presentation/speak in public
-Open communication.
-Inspire / motivate others.
-Organizing unique eXperiences .
-Being accurate and going for the best result.
-Performance part/accessory development 
-2 stroke knowledge.
-Postive Mindset.

profile_positions.description:
Restoring oldtimer car en motorbike.  
Projects doen
Vespa PK50S, full restoration and engine tuning
Landrover 80 series full restauration and engine modification (mercedes engine inside, overhauled the cilinder head and pistons
Landcruiser HJ60 series, restauration with improvements like  adding airconditioning system, new seats, alarm system , winch installation, stainless steel exhaust,  full engine swap(upgrade with turbo) ,full floating rear axle.  Remote controlled heater system webasto installed.
profile_positions.title: Restoration Technician

profile_positions.description:
Developed and LPG injection system for diesel engine to reduce emision . fuel consumption and increase performance
The high compression of diesel engines makes it perfect to make an LPG injection system to gain more power with a cleaner exhaust. 
Development was done with several partners, many testing hours and fine-tuning on software and settings were done.
Result
After 3 years the results are amazing; fuel consumption dropped 50% and  exhaust output is more clean than regular diesel car today. Torque and power increased on the whole power band.

A complete ECU was made  with new software written  with a dashboard to program the system.
The system has many safety features to operate  according regulation .

The system can be used for turbo engines and non turbo engines
profile_positions.title: Innovator

profile_positions.location: South africa , Iceland, Netherlands, Finland, aruba
profile_positions.description:
Tailormade travel program with on special locations globally

Organise motorized traveling programs.

For end-customer and incentive for companies

Goal;
It must be a unique experience
( NOT tourist holiday)

Cooperated with;
-Yamaha Motor Netherlands
-Yamaha Motor South Africa
-Lexus South Africa
-Atric trucks Iceland
-Yamaha Finland

Incentive customers
-TW steel
-Yamaha Netherlands
-Yamaha Motor Europe

Trips;
*Snowmobile Xperience in North of Europe (Lapland) close to North Artic circle.
6 days all inclusive
Unique long riding on snowmobile, experience dry cold and sleeping in glass iglo after meeting Santa Claus for real.

*Iceland Experience. 
6 days.
An off-road loop crossing center of Iceland
enjoying nature in cold an hot at same time,
riding on black sand is like riding on the moon.

*South Africa Xperience
7 days.
Experience the beauty of South Africa.
Unique sleep in luxury hotels but also in tents by the beach,
riding the dunes with car or bike and close encounters with wild life.

Future plan:
Greeenland

profile_positions.description:
Ralley Navigation Solutions was a young start up company in Germany  which makes equipment for rally navigation. 

I supported, guided and invested in this company.
I Advice to improve quality and price structure set up

RNS is after Dakar rally 2013 a wel proven product.
Top riders from KTM, Yamaha , Husqvarna used this product with great satisfaction.

Honda Europe introduced this trip-master with limited edition of new Africa Twin.
profile_positions.title: Investor and distributor for the Benelux

profile_positions.description:
Junior Riding eXperience, an unique event
Concept;
bring MX to the family who does not know in a safe environment.
Promote MX sports and create postive vibes for the sports and brand Yamaha 

Where? On national events.
For whom? Suitable for youngsters age 5 to 15 years.

What is unique;
Free of charge, in full save environment creating a memorie for life, also from parent point of view.

Job responsibilities; 
-Maintain and ride Truck with trailer. 
-Maintain bikes and ATV.
-Managing sponsor contracts.
-Manage parts for motorcycles and ATV.
-Plan events.
-Update website.
-Make contracts with clients.
-Train the trainers. 
-Set out track.
-Hiring staff. (up to 30 people per day on big events)

Developed an Unique air-fence track so the riders are always in a safe track
The concept/blueprint was copied to Italy and Austria.

Numbers;
-Per day between 200 and 250 unique kids.
-Over 10 years and still unique in its kind.


Proud;
Over 15000 kids participate in this program in the past 10 years .

Creating Champions!
profile_positions.title: Founder / Owner Junior Riding Experience

profile_positions.description:
Bouw begeleiding van renovatie van huizen/appartementen in Amsterdam en omgeving.
Offertes maken en planning bewaken mbt projecten.
Zorg dragen dat het process vlotjes verloopt met onderaannemers en geleverde materialen.
In het werk op zoek naar oplossing bij onverwachte situaties.
Communicatie met de klant houden waarop de klant  zich gehoord voelt.
Communicatie met klant is denk ik wel 1 van de belangrijkste punten een project positief af te sluiten.

Meedenken met energie transitie mogelijkheden
Dat houd in dat er veel onderzoeken en mogelijk samen werken met leveranciers/installateurs  mbt warmte pompen, isolatie, WTW units.
Selectie van betrouwbare partners waarmee een lange samenwerking gepland word met het oog op kwaliteit en kosten. Tornen aan kwaliteit is geen optie. 
Mijn kennis en passie zit in de innovatie: op zoek naar oplossingen om een pad tebanen voor een lange duurzame toekomst.


Customer satisfaction is highest priority

Work executed;
-Renovations.
-Rebuilding's.
-Taylor made furniture.
-Installing intercom systems
-Installing security cameras
-Hiring contractors 
-Maintain quality during construction.
-Communication with customer.
-Make calculation and planning and make sure they stay in line.

Strength;
Honest open communication / advice to customer. 
Offering craftsmanship and quality.

Trots op een renovatie project waarbij in 1 week tijd volledig boven verdieping  van Sony Europe werd verbouwd tot een showroom . 
Tijdplanning was was hier cruciaal.(bijna onmogelijk) Dat werd dus ook in de avonden en nachten werken om de planning vloeiend te laten verlopen. Met goede inzet van vakmannen en onderaannemers en leveranciers. Dit kan enkel wanneer er een goede verstandhouding tussen alle partijen, dan wil een ieder een extra beentje voor zetten.
profile_positions.title: Aannemer/ project begeleider

profile_positions.description:
Job responsibility ;
Introduce and maintain a profitable accessory line-up.
  
Job description;
As a product manager you are the spider in the web within the Yamaha Motor Group.
You are in contact  with many stakeholders  and make it all work together to come to a great result in terms of profit, in time to to market with the right product and right promotion.
Think customer centric.
As product manger you will also  take care of any tets required for introduction of these parts in Europe. This will be done within intern test facilities and /or external companies 

Product group;
-Motocross 
-Enduro
-ATV
-SxS

This involves; 
-Market study, 
-Creating businessplan
-analyse seasonal sales and adjust replenishment if required
-Preparing marketing plan 
-Set up future strategy of GYTR performance parts development
-Set up test requirements and coordinate execution with test riders or test agencies
-Support After-Sales with technical questions
-Support service department with claims
-Find reliable good business partners
-Build up trust and steady relationship
-Introducing the GYTR brand in Europe 
-Advise in apparel line up
-Advise in Care line products 
-Advice in parts sales for MX

Communication with;
-Buyers
-Inventory coordinators
-Suppliers
-Distributors
-Dealers
-Unit product planning
-Management
-Marketing
-Race teams
-Test riders
-Test facilities
-Press during press events and trade fairs


Work on a global scale with  Yamaha Motor USA , Yamaha Motor Japan and race teams in Europe to have best results.
2 stroke GYTR parts are all made in Europe,
 
Additional work;
I was involved in maintaining and evolving a technical database developed by Yamaha Motor Europe.
It is used by product planners and is also connected with marketing and website systems.

Proud;
-Introducing the GYTR brand in Europe with good racing products  briniging good results in racing and  revenue.
-GYTR Products are sold worlwide 
-Today GYTR is a strong brand in MX and Road racing.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project manager Parts and Accessories Development

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Quality Assurance process at Accessory Product Planning group. 

Countabilities;
-Checking claims of European distributors,
-Reduce the amount of claims by implementing several QA procedures and -make " Trouble tree" and teach distrubtors how to use to reduce he amount of non legit Claims
-Setting up quality guideline 
-Monitor/maintain high quality level during development
-Managing all test unit
-Create database of mastersample storage 


Proud on;
Introducing the new standard for Installation Manuals for accessories (No text manuals)
in order to save cost on translation cost and still meet the European law requirements. 
It is so called Pictogram manual, (AKA "Ikea" -style.)
Set up an "how To" file to make pictures for such a manual to be used by Product Managers and or suppliers
This standard has been taken over by Head Quarters Yamaha Motor in Japan.
